attributes.action: We need OCR GCSE Computer Science grade boundaries need to be LOW
attributes.additional_details:
For most of the questions in paper 2, especially the programming ones, The instructions asked on what to write our algorithm about made absolutely no sense. My friends and I who are usually good at Computer Science were shocked on how bad the wordings were which affected our exam performance, where some questions were impossible to answer. I got a severe panic attack, and my friend nearly fainted.

Compared to previous past papers the formatting, types of questions asked were VERY different.
attributes.background: Instruct OCR to have LOW grade boundaries or redo paper 2.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Grade boundaries for exams are set by exam boards, not the Government or Parliament.
